info.name: AutoHub Philippines API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete Postman collection for AutoHub Car Marketplace Philippines API

## Overview
- **Base URL**: `http://localhost:8000`
- **API Version**: v1
- **Authentication**: JWT Bearer Token
- **Content-Type**: application/json

## Getting Started
1. Register a new user via `/api/v1/auth/register`
2. Login via `/api/v1/auth/login` to get access token
3. Set the `{{access_token}}` variable with the token from login response
4. Use the token in Authorization header for protected endpoints

## Environment Variables
Create these variables in Postman:
- `base_url`: http://localhost:8000
- `access_token`: (will be set automatically after login)
- `refresh_token`: (will be set automatically after login)
- `user_id`: (will be set automatically after login)
- `car_id`: (set after creating a car)
- `inquiry_id`: (set after creating an inquiry)

## Author
AutoHub Team - Complete API Testing Suite

item.name: Health Check

request.description: Check if the API server is healthy and running
Get API welcome message and documentation links

item.description: Basic health check and status endpoints

request.description: Register a new buyer account. Returns access_token and refresh_token.
Register a new seller account with business name
Login with email and password to get JWT tokens
Check if email is available for registration
Get current user's verification status (email, phone, identity, business)
Refresh access token using refresh token
Upgrade user from buyer to seller
Upgrade user to dealer with business verification
Mark a specific notification as read

body.raw:
{
    "brand_id": 1,
    "model_id": 1,
    "year": 2020,
    "price": 850000,
    "title": "2020 Toyota Vios 1.3E MT - Well Maintained",
    "description": "Excellent condition, single owner, complete papers, casa maintained. Low mileage, no accident history.",
    "mileage": 35000,
    "fuel_type": "gasoline",
    "transmission": "manual",
    "city_id": 1,
    "latitude": 14.5995,
    "longitude": 120.9842,
    "features": [1, 2, 3, 5, 8]
}
